channel.title: [PI] Hidden accounts on project insanity
channel.description: [PI] so i understand that there was some accounts on project insanity source that had a spawn fix when you logged into them so you could spawn with that account or w.e i was just wondering what those accounts were so i could eliminate them from my server and stop people from doing this thanks :)

item.title: [PI] Hidden accounts on project insanity
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I don’t know where you got that information, but it’s wrong.
The only way this would be true, is if you didn’t edit the server enough to remove the old owners work.
Ex:
In commands.java (src>server>model>players>packets) there may be a command like:
if(playerCommand.equals(“spawn”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Owner Mark”)){
//Do shit
}

Then anyone with the name “Owner Mark” would be able to use the command spawn, but there’s many ways it could be spelled because you used .“equalsIgnoreCase”
So just go through your files, and make sure that there aren’t any checks for old names, or rights that you don’t use, etc.

Read full topic
